```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
mack_verts <- read_csv(here::here("data", "AS00601.csv"))
view(mack_verts)
names(mack_verts)
mack_verts <- clean_names(mack_verts)
```

```{r}
mc_wt_5 <- mack_verts$weight[5]
mc_length_8_20 <- mack_verts$length1[8]
mc_dates <- mack_verts$sampledate

```

```{r}
mc_salamanders <- filter(mack_verts, species == "DITE")
```

```{r}
plot <- ggplot(data = mc_salamanders, aes(x= length1, y= weight)) + labs(title = "Salemanders", y = "Weight (g)",x= "Length (mm)", subtitle = "Length vs. Weight") + geom_point()

plot
```

```{r}
ggsave(here::here("figs", "salamander_size.png"), height = 6, width = 7)
```

```{r}
mc_trout <- filter(mack_verts, species == "ONCL")
```

```{r}
plot2 <- ggplot(data = mc_trout, aes(x= length1, y= weight, col = reach)) + labs(title = "Trout", y = "Weight (g)",x= "Length (mm)", subtitle = "Length vs. Weight") + facet_wrap(~reach) + scale_color_manual(values = c("red", "purple", "blue")) + geom_point()

plot2
```

```{r}
ggsave(here::here("figs", "cutthroat_size.png"), height = 6, width = 7)
```
